Product title: Large Towel Warmer for Bathroom - Heated Towel Warmers Bucket, Wood Handle, Auto Shut Off, Fits Up to Two 40"X70" Oversized Towels, Bathrobes, Blankets, for Mother's Gifts, White
Key Features: Plastic | Generous Capacity Warmer: This spacious bathroom essential can easily accommodate two extra-large 40" x 70" bath towels, along with robes, blankets, pajamas, and more. Alternatively, it can hold around 5 medium-sized bath towels. With dimensions of 11.53" in length, 11.53" in width, and 19" in height, it boasts a total capacity of 20 liters, making it ideal for family use. Elevate your home with a spa-like touch.You can safely heat cotton materials, but please refrain from heating chemical fiber towels or clothing, as well as any materials that are not heat-resistant.Do not use it to dry wet towels or other damp items. | Experience Swift Heating: With a simple process, just place your towels within the warmer, shut the lid, and press the WORK button. The 450W heating element ensures even warming, bringing your towels to a cozy temperature within 25 minutes. Use the TIMER button to choose a preservation time between 1 to 4 hours, guaranteeing a supply of warm towels whenever desired. Immerse yourself in a spa-like oasis right in your own bathroom.Upon startup, the built-in timer defaults to 30 minutes. If you wish to keep it on for 30 minutes, there is no need for set. The indicator light will automatically illuminate once the 30-minute insulation mode is activated. | Safety at the Core: Safety is paramount, which is why our ETL-certified towel warmer features a wooden lid and a fire-resistant, eco-friendly plastic exterior that poses no allergenic risks to the body. The triple-layer temperature control mechanism automatically shuts off the heater if the internal bucket temperature becomes too high, effectively preventing any potential overheating issues. Enjoy the warmth indoors with complete peace of mind, relishing in your spa-inspired experience.Please take note of the bucket body indicator: It is unsafe to touch the interior of the device when the hot surface indicator light is on. | A Remarkable Gift: This versatile towel warmer serves as the ultimate accessory for various settings, including homes, pools, showers, hotels, salons, spas, massages, baby care, and elderly care. Once you've indulged in the luxury of warm towels, you'll be treated to a delightful surprise after every bath. It's a thoughtful and considerate gift choice for housewarmings, weddings, showers, birthdays, anniversaries, and countless other occasions.
comment 1: Got it for a gift for my husband. He absolutely loves it. Warms up quick and easy. Fits about 3 towels. We got the white one to go with our restroom. It was definitely worth it for us! - Maria Velasquez
comment 2: I really like this towel warmer and it works great — it heats up quickly and feels amazing getting out of the shower to a warm towel. My only complaint is the size. It says it holds two towels, but realistically it only fits one regular-sized towel. Other than that, I’m very happy with it and would recommend it. - Jaymie Donner
comment 3: I bought this for my friend for Christmas. She loves it, perfect for someone wanting to have warm towels when getting out of the shower. I think this can be an easy and great gift for any of your girl friends. Great quality, color goes with any bathroom design, and it can be stored in bathroom or closet. - Anita Karyne Bradbury
comment 4: I like. But it takes a while to warm up. - Deronda
comment 5: These worked great for my outdoor shower! Purchased two (2) of them. These make outdoor showering a great experience! - GiGi Baker
